name: Asylum for the Insane - Stationary Set with Envelopes
description:
Set of 10 Bedlam Asylum "Sanitorium for the Insane and Incurable" stationary sheets with aged and distressed appearance. These include blood splatters, and i have a listing for ones without as well. These also include 5 envelopes which have anatomical skull images. 
Handmade and hand-cut from high quality velvety matte photo-grade paper.

Bring back the lovely and nostalgic art of letter writing in the most unique way! (These would also make great Halloween party invitations or favors.)
You will receive:
10 stationary sheets
5 thick "brown bag" envelopes with skull detail in corner. These come wrapped in black ribbon and sealed in a clear cello sleeve. (Stationary will of course come without watermarks.)

These sheets measure about 5 1/4" x 4". the envelopes are A2 size; 4 3/8 x 5 3/4. 
They will be delivered in a photo-mailer as to ensure no bending or mistreatment.

Each order comes with free goodies, so do inspect your package! ♥


Designs and Images © Bedlamsupplyco/Ginger Nielsen. No images, designs, or photographs may be reproduced or resold without permission from the publisher. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

name: Illicit Drugs Sticker Set
description:
Here is a set of 3 sticker labels featuring Opium, Heroin, and Cannabis. These stickers display an array of lovely font and weathered backgrounds. These have an antiquated and Victorian feel, reminiscent of the drug labels found at the pharmacist years ago.

Labels are printed with fade resistant and smear resistant high quality ink, and all font is very sharp and readable.
. 
These are all around 3" x 3 1/2", and larger, and you will receive 3 of them.

Each order comes with free goodies, so do inspect your package!

All designs copyright protected, 2012

name: Toxic Antiquities Sticker Set
description:
Here is a set of 6 stickers of various poisons I have made by hand, and have been hand-cut as well. 
I aimed to capture a vintage/Victorian appeal, and they feature weathered writing and faded style. 

You can almost smell the antiseptic lingering scent of hospitals and see long abandoned haunted hallways of institutions looking at these.

Have fun with these detailed matte stickers, which are printed with a fade resistant and smear resistant high quality ink. These are not waterproof.
These measure about or more than 3 3/4" x 2" and you will receive 6 of them.

Each order comes with free goodies, so do inspect your package! ♥



Designs and Images © Bedlamsupplyco/Ginger Nielsen. No images, designs, or photographs may be reproduced or resold without permission from the publisher. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

name: Delightfully Morbid Toe Tags - Set of 4
description:
Here is a set of 4 finely made toe-tags. These are handmade and actual replicas, and are true to size. They are made of a VERY thick high-quality cardstock and each come with black ribbon. I have aged these and added fine details as well. Good enough for gift-giving!
These would make a great party favor; for invitations or gift-tags, Halloween or over-the-hill. ;)

These are printed with high-quality, fade resistant, smear resistant ink, and are acid free. 

Tags are 5" x 2 1/2". This set of 4 will be delivered sealed in a clear sleeve and in photo-mailer as to ensure no bending or mistreatment.

Each order comes with free goodies, so do inspect your package! ♥


Designs and Images © bedlamsupplyco/Ginger Nielsen. No images, designs, or photographs may be reproduced or resold without permission from the publisher. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

name: Victorian Deaths - Elegant Stationary Set with Envelopes
description:
Set of 10 Victorian style and very elegant stationary sheets along with 5 anatomical skull envelopes with anatomical skull accents, all with little macabre details!
Handmade and hand-cut from high quality matte photo-grade paper.
Bring back the lovely and nostalgic art of letter writing in the most eloquent way!

You will receive:
10 stationary sheets; 5 of each design
5 thick "brown bag" envelopes with skull detail in corner
These come wrapped in black ribbon and sealed in a clear cello sleeve.


These sheets have an elaborate border along with antique style skull accents, and have been made to appear old, yellowed, and aged in the most lovely way.
These would be lovely given as gifts, love-notes, hate-notes, for scrap-booking, invites, Halloween decor, etc. 

(Stationary will of course come without the handwriting; notes written shown in photos are simply for example.)

These sheets measure about 5 1/4" x 4". the envelopes are A2 size; 4 3/8 x 5 3/4. 
They will be sealed in a clear cello sleeve and delivered in a photo-mailer as to ensure no bending or mistreatment.

Each order comes with free goodies, so do inspect your package! ♥


Designs and Images © BedlamSupplyCo/Ginger Nielsen. No images, designs, or photographs may be reproduced or resold without permission from the publisher. All rights reserved. For personal use only.
